org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

Class StoreFileInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.StoreFileInfo

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class StoreFileInfo
extends Object
    Describe a StoreFile (hfile, reference, link)

    • Field Detail

      • HFILE_NAME_REGEX

        public static final String HFILE_NAME_REGEX
        A non-capture group, for hfiles, so that this can be embedded. HFiles are uuid ([0-9a-z]+). Bulk loaded hfiles has (_SeqId_[0-9]+_) has suffix. The mob del file has (_del) as suffix.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DELFILE_NAME_REGEX

        public static final String DELFILE_NAME_REGEX
        A non-capture group, for del files, so that this can be embedded. A del file has (_del) as suffix.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getActiveFileName

        public String getActiveFileName()
        Return the active file name that contains the real data.

        For referenced hfile, we will return the name of the reference file as it will be used to construct the StoreFileReader. And for linked hfile, we will return the name of the file being linked.
